rendered:
懮懮懮
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

懮字的基本解释

懮
yōu
〔懮懮〕愁苦的样子，如“伤余心之懮懮。”

懮
yǒu
〔懮受〕轻盈。

懮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǒu］
［《廣韻》於柳切，上有，影。］
见“懮受”。
[②]［yōu］
［《集韻》於求切，平尤，影。］
同“憂1”。

懮字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懮； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页407第32
【廣韻】於柳切【集韻】【韻會】於九切，?音黝。【集韻】舒遲貌。【詩·?風】舒懮受兮。　又【集韻】於求切，音憂。【說文】愁也。本作?。或作懮。通作憂。【楚辭·九章】傷余心之懮懮。

懮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
懮字的起名意思

暂无。

Sorrow
Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
yōu
[懮懮] A sad look, such as "The sadness of the broken heart."
Sorrow
yǒu
〔懮受〕Lightness.
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǒu］
["Guangyun" in Liuqie, there is a shadow on it. ]
See "suffering".
[②]［yōu］
["Ji Yun" Yu Qiuqie, Pingyou, Ying. ]
Same as "Worry 1".
Sorrow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　懮; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 407 32
[Guang Yun] Yu Liuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yu Jiuqie,? [Ji Yun] Shu Chi's appearance. 【Poetry·? Wind】Shu Shang accepts Xi.　[Jiyun] In seeking to cut, the sound is worried. [Said Wen] Worry too. This work?. Or as shameless. Pass for worry. [Songs of the Chu Nine Chapters] The sadness of sorrowing my heart.
Sorrow
